title: 1000th Game
body: So I've only got 24 more wins to go until my 1000th game, I know a lot of Riot members used to join people to get their 1000th win, just curious if anyone is still keen for that? Been a while since I've posted on the forums xD

replies.body:
I'll play!

Add me in game and when you hit 1,000 we'll rock it.
what a awesome rioter who interacts with the community :D
